name: Fact or Fiction? (T-Shirt)
description: Are You Based on a True Story? Demonstrate your style instincts, with our next limited edition silk-screened T-shirt, illustrated by artist Chris Piascik. This is an inaugural Limited Edition print of 100 shirts, so get your size while they last. Printed on American Apparel 100% ring-spun fine jersey cotton. Made in the USA. Available in both Men's and Women's styles. Forthcoming design also as poster print. Sizes run small, especially Women's. Mens Sizing Guide Womens Sizing Guide By default: all orders are shipped USPS Two-Day Priority ($4.95). International orders ($13.45). Want new design updates? Subscribe to RSS feed on the right. Now go swim in the deep end: GetStoried.com.

name: Story Manifesto (Signed!)
description: Believe Me: a Storytelling Manifesto for Change-Makers and Innovators. Read the manifesto that put Get Storied on the map. 15 storytelling axioms that will change how you think about work, life, and the art of persuasion. You can now order a copy signed by author Michael Margolis for just $14.95. Three dollars less than the price on Amazon.com By default: all orders are shipped USPS Priority ($4.95). International orders ($13.45). "For anyone trying to get their audience to own the story, read this book! Margolis re-frames the conversation of social transformation in a refreshing manner useful to any leader creating change in their organization or community." - Judy Braus, SVP Education & Centers, National Audubon Society "In Believe Me, Margolis describes the many factors reshaping the rules of business.
